message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. A fair deal is better than risking it all.
Bob, this is the same offer as before.  I'm losing value with every round we waste, so take the deal while it's still good!
Alice, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. Time is running out for both of us.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer or I'm going to start getting desperate!
Alice, I'll take your original offer.  Let's end this before we both lose out.
